resources.string: Hi, this is a quiz app, which is designed to let you know if you know the basics of Android development and you\'re ready to learn the advance concepts.
Which language you must know to learn the Android Development?
Which intent do you use to jump to another activity in the same app?
Which IDE can be used for Android development?
The class which is completely un-implemented is called?
The class which is partially implemented is called?
Which of them can you implement on your own, confidently?
How confident do you feel in searching for the solution of problems you feel while development?
